title: Racism?

replies.body:
Racism is actual hate, hate and the 'knowledge' that you are actually superior to another race.

I doubt very much you are finding 4 people in every 2nd game that genuinely HATE other people just for having different skin colour. 
Very very very few people are actually 'elitist' anymore, as in think they are genetically superior to everyone else and thus should be a higher class.

Name calling like: Dirty Indian, White trash, Dumb Maori, American Slob. Is just that; name calling. Its no different to calling someone an 'ignorant fuckwit' Youre just bringing up their race, instead of their ignorance. 

Stereotypes exist, it doesn't make them correct, but they exist none the less. The world views Americans as fat slobs who live on  country ranches with a dirty singlet and a shotgun. The world views pacific islanders as large jolly people who live in houses made of palm trees. just like they view aussies as crocodile dundee cowboys who spend their time wrestling snakes and crocs between chugging down boxes of beer.

Stereotypes are not racist. (they may not be the kindest thing to say to someone, but they aren't actual HATE.)

Forbidding someone from talking shit about someone's race is the true racism, because the act of making a law that prevents you from saying '%%%%%%'. in itself is racism because it Implies that we need to protect black people, from being called '%%%%%%s' because they aren't strong enough to protect themselves.

Im definitely not racist and i try to avoid directly insulting people altogether, let alone insulting peoples race.

But next time you encounter these 'racists' have a think to yourself:
"Is this person a 12 year old who is mad because I killed him, and now wants to make himself feel better by hurting my feelings. OR is he an elitist who sits in his armchair complaining to his wife about how there are dirty black people in his neighbourhood?"

Because chances are, its the first option, and not an actual racist.
Hit the nail on the head.

this is oceania, probably the most blunt server there is, which can be labeled as racist.

and before you start judging people with your passive aggressive trolling, people may just be culturalist, not racist.

I can say i'm not a fan of Indian males from the homeland that congregate around their own sub-culture within australia, as with middle eastern men, i'm aware of how their views as a vast majority are towards women and the kind of things they do. 

So i'm partial on the side that indian males have something to prove before i respect them fully, however. I won't let my preconceptions affect how i perceive you.

Keep in mind, we don't play in a game where the bigger side of the community is mature adults, we play in a community that is mostly teenagers and early/mid 20's. Alot of which, are as immature and "smart arses" as much as they can be thinking trash talking is a sign of cool behavior because its funny when it happens to others. 

I don't condone their actions, but i'm aware you're hunting these sorts of negative responses. There is a report button at the end of every game which can be used for racism. I don't know why you brought it here, other than once again. Attention.

I had a guy in my game who is using the retarded teen thing of "it's not racist, it's stereotypist".

Basically he said he wants all dark skinned people dead, and Martin Luther King is his favorite dark skinned person because he is dead. He also called people the "n" word multiple times. As you can tell I had pretty much censored his statements beyond recognition.
